name: Keto Cauliflower Fried Rice
steps:
Grate cauliflower into rice-like pieces.
Scramble eggs in a pan and set aside.
Cook chicken in sesame oil until done.
Add garlic and vegetables, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add cauliflower rice and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add eggs, soy sauce, and mix everything together.
Serve hot.
